nodes.text: A group of Imperial cargo freighters which were trying to bring repair equipment to damaged Imperial II-class Star Destroyer Corrupter in the Mev system. They were escorted by Monitor. They were completely destroyed by the Rebel Alliance in the Battle of Bettel, shortly after the Battle of Hoth.

The three transports carrying Probe Droids is likely a reference to an earlier mission, in which the player destroys three sets of probe droids. The droids mentioned in this mission are likely replenishments.
